productos.nombre: Forged Steel Check Valves for Nuclear Applications
productos.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Check valves are installed to allow flow in one direction only and they protect systems that can be affected by reverse flow, such as a system shutdown. They are operated entirely by reaction to the flow and therefore do not require external actuation. Care and attention should be paid to check valve installation orientation. Design features
caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards.
A compact but extremely sturdy design for high pressuretemperature service.
Quick and easy inline repair for bolted cover valves.

productos.nombre: Forged Steel Extended Body Gate Valves for Nuclear Applications
productos.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Design features
caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards.
Available with an extended body or an integrally reinforced extended body (IREB).
Extended body gate valves have a welded or NPT connection and are used for tapping of pressure vessels and header lines for vents, drains or takeoff lines and instrumentation.
Also available with extended body assemblies for vents, drains, and instrument root valves.

productos.nombre: Forged Steel Gate Valves for Nuclear Applications
productos.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Design features
caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards.
A compact but extremely sturdy design for high pressure-temperature service.
Packing rings are pre-compressed in the packing chamber to ensure equal stress distribution, effectiveness of all rings and a high integrity seal.

For welded bonnet valves, the bonnet is threaded in and torqued to an engineered torque value and the body bonnet joint is strength-welded, offering double protection against leakage. (body/bonnet threads and strength-weld).
CoCr alloy hardfaced wedge (optional) ensures low friction and long service life.
Fully guided wedge reduces wear on seating surfaces.
For Class 1500 valves and for steam service, seats are seal-welded to the body.
Repairable two-piece stem drive.

productos.nombre: API 602 Forged Steel Extended Body Gate Valves
caracteristicas: Long cycle life bellows (3000 cycles): Gr. 321 (stainless) for Class 800, Gr. 321 or Inconel for Class 1500, and Hastelloy C for chlorine service. Optional materials available on request. Designed and qualification-tested for high pressure/temperature service.
Bellows monitoring port (optional): A plug can be connected with the space above the bellows to monitor performance.
Two secondary stem seals: a) Backseat in open position; b) Graphite packing.
Superior seating faces: Seats hardfaced with CoCr alloy and wedge is solid CoCr alloy.

productos.nombre: ASME B16.34 Forged Steel Globe Continuous Blowdown Valve
productos.descripcion: API 602 small forged globe valve designed for continuous blowdown.
caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards
Incorporating a hardfaced CoCr alloy disc and seat and a venturi diffuser from stainless steel type 316.
Orifice range: 1⁄8 to 11 1⁄16” (3.18 to 42.86 mm), depending on the capacity required.
Can also be used for sampling and boiler feed pump bypass relief where high pressure drop causes erosion and cavitation that can destroy conventional globe valves

productos.nombre: ASME B16.34 Forged Steel Angle Globe Boiler Blowoff Valve
productos.descripcion: These special small forged blowoff valves are available in bolted bonnet angle and streamlined flow 45° inclined designs for Class 600 and 1500 primary service and in bonnetless angle and inclined designs for Class 2500.
caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards.
CoCr alloy seats and fully-guided CoCr alloy discs resist the excessive corrosion and erosion effects aggravated by grid and boiler scale particles and high temperature changes.

Velan boiler blowoff valves meet all applicable specifications of the ASME boiler code, U.S. military standards (listed on qualified product list), U.S. Coast Guard, American Bureau of Shipping and Lloyd’s.

productos.descripcion: All basic design features of Velan small forged steel gate valves are adapted to special service conditions at cryogenic temperatures. ADDITIONAL DESIGN FEATURES:
caracteristicas: Extended bonnets with sufficient gas column length, usually specified by customer, are supplied for all valves to keep stem packing at sufficient distance away from the cold fluid to remain functional.
Solid CoCr alloy wedges on NPS 1⁄2 – 2 (DN 15–50) valves operate with no galling in cryogenic service.
Cleaning: All cryogenic valves are thoroughly degreased and cleaned and pipe ends are sealed to prevent contamination.

caracteristicas: Complies to API 602 and ASME B16.34 standards.
A compact but extremely sturdy design for high pressure-temperature service.
Available with bolted or welded bonnet.
Meets API 624 and ISO 15848-1 fugitive emissions standards.
Packing rings are pre-compressed in the packing chamber to ensure equal stress distribution, effectiveness of all rings and a high integrity seal.

For welded bonnet valves, the bonnet is threaded in and torqued to an engineered torque value and the body bonnet joint is strength-welded, offering double protection against leakage. (body/bonnet threads and strength-weld).
CoCr alloy hardfaced wedge (optional) ensures low friction and long service life.
Fully guided wedge reduces wear on seating surfaces.
For Class 1500 valves and for steam service, seats are seal-welded to the body.
Repairable two-piece stem drive.
Pre-positioned field injection ports for precise application of low emissions (Low-E) injectable packing through the bonnet (applies to bolted bonnet gate NPS 1/4–2 (DN 8–50) Class 150–1500).
Optional designs available with double packing, leak-off connection, live-loading, and packing blowout for easy removal of old packing.

productos.nombre: ASME B16.34 Forged Steel Bonnetless Y-Pattern Globe Valve

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Socket weld, butt weld, and threaded

caracteristicas: Complies to ASME B16.34 standards.
Designed for quick and easy maintenance – one step removal of all working parts including packing.
All pressure containing parts within one body-bonnet forging – no joints to leak or welds to cut for servicing.
Non rotating stem allows a non-spinning disc, ensures low torque and prevents torsional damage of the packing.
Fully enclosed, lubricated stem drive system with needle bearings ensures low operating torque.
Solid CoCr alloy disc, seat ring and backseat provide excellent long service life even in severe services.
Backseat bevel on the stem, not on the disc, satisfies both API-600 and API-602 specifications.
Optional live-loading: keeps packing tight for long periods of time without maintenance.
Optional double packing and leak-off.
